au.com.cybersearch2.classyjpa.entity

Class EntityManagerDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.com.cybersearch2.classyjpa.entity.EntityManagerDelegate

  • public class EntityManagerDelegate
extends Object
    EntityManagerDelegate Object returned by ClassyFyEntityManager getDelegate() method to give caller access to OrmLite DAOs
    Author:
    Andrew Bowley 03/05/2014

      • getTransaction

        public javax.persistence.EntityTransaction getTransaction()
        Returns enclosing transaction. If in user transaction mode, this will be the actual transaction object, otherwise, it will be a proxy which only supports setRollbackOnly()
        Returns:
        EntityTransaction
